sentence: He sports endorsements from Sen. Rand Paul of Kentucky and a collection of conservative populists who are popular in the wing of the Republican Party most supportive of former President Donald Trump, including Reps. Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina, Matt Gaetz of Florida, and Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia.
author: David M. Drucker
title: Anthony Sabatini has a low opinion of Republicans he hopes to serve with in DC

sentence: That is the object lesson of Representative Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina, the House's youngest member, whose bid for a second term is in jeopardy after a series of incendiary statements and personal foibles have soured many former supporters.
title: House Republicans Tire of Madison Cawthorn's Antics. Some in His District Have, Too.

sentence: Unfortunately, Madison Cawthorn has fallen well short of the most basic standards Western North Carolina expects from their representatives.? But if losing Tillis' endorsement and a reprimand from House leadership was meant to temper Cawthorn's actions, it doesn't appear to have worked.

title: Opinion: Sarah Palin is back, for a GOP that was remade in her image

sentence: Washington is meanwhile still reverberating with a bizarre episode triggered by Republican North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn's claim he was invited to an orgy and saw leaders in the nation's anti-drug fight snorting cocaine.

title: Rep. Greene declines to say if interfering with electoral count makes one an enemy of the Constitution'

sentence: North Carolina GOP Rep. Madison Cawthorn blasted the Left for dredging up photographs of him wearing women's lingerie, saying the newly resurfaced photos amount to a desperate attempt to hurt him.

title: Cawthorn slams Left for unearthing 'goofy' photos of him in lingerie

sentence: AD WARS Sen. THOM TILLIS isn't letting up in his opposition to fellow North Carolina Republican Rep. MADISON CAWTHORN: A Tillis-aligned super PAC is putting up $310,000 to air an ad attacking Cawthorn, per Axios' Lachlan Markay.
title: POLITICO Playbook PM: McCarthy gets a lifeline (and another leak)

sentence: That section declares that no person shall? hold any office, civil or military, under the United States, or under any state, who, having previously taken an oath? to support the Constitution,? had then engaged in insurrection or rebellion against the same, or given aid or comfort to the enemies thereof.? Similar cases have suffered setbacks in North Carolina, where a federal judge blocked a challenge against Representative Madison Cawthorn, another far-right Republican, and in Arizona, where the Superior Court in Maricopa County ruled on Thursday that it did not have the authority to block the re-elections of two other conservative Republicans, Representatives Paul Gosar and Andy Biggs, and the candidacy for secretary of state of a state representative, Mark Finchem.
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Denies Insurrectionist' Charge in Court

sentence: Greene filed a federal lawsuit to shut down the state process -- which is how GOP Rep. Madison Cawthorn fended off a similar candidacy challenge in North Carolina.
author: Marshall Cohen
title: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene testifies for more than 3 hours in hearing on whether to disqualify her from seeking reelection

sentence: Republican Reps. Matt Gaetz of Florida, Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina, and Paul Gosar of Arizona have all proxy voted over 100 times.
author: Bryan Metzger
title: These 15 Republicans have proxy voted at least 100 times even though Kevin McCarthy and GOP leadership think voting remotely is unconstitutional

sentence: Thom Tillis called Wednesday for the House Ethics Committee to investigate fellow North Carolina Republican Rep. Madison Cawthorn after watchdog agencies told the Washington Examiner the congressman could be implicated in an insider trading scheme,? reports Anna Kaplan: Tillis said in a tweet insider trading by a member of Congress is a serious betrayal of their oath,? adding that Cawthorn owes North Carolinians an explanation.? The Examiner reports Cawthorn was pictured at an event on December 29 with James Koutoulas, one of the people behind the Let's Go Brandon? cryptocurrency, which is named after the viral chant insulting President Joe Biden.
author: Zach Everson
title: Checks & Imbalances: McCarthy's Money, Cawthorn's Crypto, Truth Social's Triumph

sentence: Look at Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.), emblematic of the new generation of Republican stars, along with figures such as Marjorie Taylor Greene (Ga.) and Matt Gaetz (Fla.).
